item.description:
Saturday Nite Dance Party at the beautiful Marco Polo Restaurant & Banquet Facility SATURDAY June 6 2009 at 8 pm

Join Central CT Singles And Hundreds Of Local Singles and Dance The Night Away –Meet Someone Special And Party With Central CT Singles

“Singles Dances provide the opportunity to meet many local singles all in one place!
So if you dance, don't dance, or just want to party with other local singles and meet someone special,
check out the next Central CT Singles Dance Party”

Your Ticket Includes:
* Specialty Pizza
* Pasta
* DJ Dance Music and Requests *
* Plenty of FREE Safe Parking *

Marco Polo Restaurant & Banquet Facility
1250 Burnside Ave
East Hartford, CT 06108
I-84 to Exit 60 (near the Manchester line - next to Wickham Park)
For Directions Visit http://www.mapquest.c...

Park in back parking lot and use the Banquet Entrance

SAVE MONEY - Tickets are only $15 at the Dance Party
ONLINE SPECIAL - 2 Tickets for $20 only at http://www.CentralCTS...

Group Special - Half Price Tickets For Groups Of 10 or More
(only $ 7.50 per ticket) and Reserved Table(s) for your Group


Check Out Our Ads In The Hartford Courant And The Hartford Advocate

CELEBRATE YOUR BIRTHDAY WITH CENTRAL CT SINGLES -AND GET FREE ADMISSION FOR THE BIRTHDAY GUY or GAL AND FREE CHAMPANGE !


Visit http://www.CentralCTS... for more info or call (860) 236-3343

SEE YOU AT THE PARTY!

UPCOMING EVENTS


FRIDAY JUNE 19 @ 8 pm FRIDAY NITE Dance Party with Central CT Singles
at Marco Polo Restaurant 1250 Burnside Ave E Hartford 06108
(Next to Wickham Park, Manchester) Tickets are $15 -includes Appetizers, DJ Dance Music
Visit www.CentralCTSingles.com or call (860) 236-3343

FRIDAY JUNE 26 @ 8 pm FRIDAY NITE Dance Party with Central CT Singles
at Marco Polo Restaurant 1250 Burnside Ave E Hartford 06108
(Next to Wickham Park, Manchester) Tickets are $15 -includes Appetizers, DJ Dance Music
Visit www.CentralCTSingles.com or call (860) 236-3343

Visit http://www.CentralCTS... for more info or call (860) 236-3343


SEE YOU AT THE PARTY!
item.how_to_find_us: Use back parking lot, use Banquet Entrance Follow the Central CT Singles Signs
